  2. AI worm infects users via AI-enabled email clients — Morris II generative AI worm steals confidential data as it spreads  Tom's Hardware
  3. Researchers Create AI-Powered Malware That Spreads on Its Own  Futurism
  4. Morris II AI worm can steal your confidential data and infect ChatGPT and Gemini  The Indian Express
  5. AI worms can spread through generative AI-powered emails.  The Verge

item.title: 'Stupidity' poses a bigger threat than AI, CEO of Italian defense giant Leonardo says - CNBC
item.description: 'Stupidity' poses a bigger threat than AI, CEO of Italian defense giant Leonardo says  CNBC
